description:
Bunmei and Maya go to Matsushiro City to look for Nostradamus`s Key.  A legendary mask has been found there. It`s said that when it and its partner meet, Minakamiyama will be destroyed.  During the investigation, Maya eagerly offers ice cream and other treats, but Bunmei is glum.  In his mind he hears again and again the words he`s been told: Maya is the key to open the door to hell.  Bunmei finally makes his decision.
Source: crunchyroll
